name: Jajil Yousuf
story: Jajil Yousuf grew up in a small village in Iran. He always had a passion for serving his country and keeping his people safe. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks. He is now a seasoned Recon Marksman and incorporates his knowledge of the land into his missions. He is married with children and often thinks about them when he is away on missions.
